general_advisory: Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: Prepare well cultivated dry bed for nursery
Sow seeds in lines and cover with soil
Apply urea for 10 decimal area
Field preparation and fill rat holes
Treat seeds with Rhizobium
Treat with Carbedazim before sowing
Choose good varieties like IP -02-14, OUM -11-5, Pant -19, PDM -54
Choose quality seeds like Upas -120, ICPl 86012, Pusa Arhar
Go for early to medium duration Arhar
Choose good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava
Prepare the land and sow seeds after good rainfall
Choose good varieties like Kalinga Maize, Prabal
Apply basal dose of NPK after land preparation
Choose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri -6, Kalinga groundnut
Treat seeds with Vitavax power and Rhizobium culture
Apply FYM, gypsum, and NPK during final land preparation
Drain excess water from the field
Drain excess water from the field
Use pheromone traps or Neem based pesticides for Brinjal fruit & Shoot Borer
Go for off-season vegetables like Cauliflower
Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac
Prepare well pulverized field for planting
